briefTitle: Genetic Markers of Circulating Tumor DNA for Monitoring Breast Cancer Patients in Costa Rica
officialTitle: Genetic Markers of Circulating Tumor DNA for Monitoring Breast Cancer in Patients of the Hospital San Juan de Dios From 2018 to 2020.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Assessment of circulating free DNA (cfDNA) concentration (in ng/uL) obtained from peripheral blood (liquid biopsy).
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Metastatic breast cancer before the start of chemotherapeutic treatment

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with incomplete clinical records
